title: CODCrafters HMS - Hospital Management System
description: Comprehensive Hospital Management System with patient records, appointment scheduling, billing, inventory management, and reporting dashboard.
longDescription: A complete hospital management solution built for modern healthcare facilities. Features include patient management, appointment scheduling, billing system, inventory tracking, staff management, and comprehensive reporting. Built with React frontend and Node.js backend with MongoDB database.

title: ICE AGE - Glacier Monitoring System
description: AI-powered system for monitoring debris-covered glaciers using satellite imagery and deep learning algorithms.
longDescription: My Final Year Project combining Software Engineering with Space Science. This system uses deep learning to automatically detect and monitor debris-covered glaciers from satellite imagery, providing crucial data for climate research.

title: Car Repair Lab Management System
description: Complete management solution for automotive repair shops with inventory tracking, appointment scheduling, and customer management.
longDescription: A comprehensive system designed for car repair shops to streamline their operations. Features include customer management, appointment scheduling, inventory tracking, service history, billing, and reporting dashboard.

title: Odoo E-commerce Integration
description: Custom Odoo module for seamless e-commerce integration with multi-channel sales management.
longDescription: A comprehensive Odoo module that integrates multiple e-commerce platforms, providing unified inventory management, order processing, and customer data synchronization across all sales channels.

title: Shopify Custom Theme Development
description: High-converting Shopify theme with advanced customization options and mobile-first design.
longDescription: A custom Shopify theme built from scratch with focus on conversion optimization, mobile responsiveness, and advanced customization options. Includes custom sections, dynamic content, and integrated analytics.
